dbi.mysql.MysqlDatabase

Authors:
The D DBI project

class MysqlDatabase: dbi.BaseDatabase.BaseDatabase;
Manage a MySQL database connection. This class implements all of the current DBD interface as defined in Database.

Limitations:
MysqlDatabase currently does not retrieve column types.

See Also:
BaseDatabase, Database

void connect(char[] conn, char[] user = null, char[] passwd = null);
Connect to a database on a MySQL server

Keywords:
host = Host name. dbname = Database name. sock = Socket. port = Port number.

Example:
(start code) MysqlDatabase db = new MysqlDatabase(); db.connect("host=localhost;dbname=test", "username", "password"); (end code)

void close();


void execute(char[] sql);


Result query(char[] sql);


deprecated int getErrorCode();
